participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative and driven, always up for an adventure, and enjoys taking care of herself.
participant_1.background: I enjoy rock music when I'm cooking dinner or driving my Mustang. I ride horses. My ultimate dream, however, is to be a writer. I have a baby monitor that I use to watch my baby while I play video games. I like to pamper myself.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and family-oriented, always looking to create new experiences and memories.
participant_2.background: I love to paint, and I love my family. I just bought a new mansion, now I can have my own Good Burger party. I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son. I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters. I am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready for work, I'm a painter. I'm excited to get started on my newest project. What are you up to?
I'm just getting ready to head out to ride horses. I'm a huge fan of rock music so I usually listen to that when I ride. I also like to pamper myself so I'm going to get a mani/pedi after my ride.

That sounds like a lot of fun! I love riding horses too. I do it as often as I can. I'm a huge fan of rock music as well. I love the energy it gives me. I'm also a writer. I've always loved writing and I'm working on my first novel.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a novel but I'm not sure I have the patience for it. I admire you for pursuing your dream.
Thanks! It's been a long journey but I'm finally starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel.
I'm sure it will be worth it. I can't wait to read your book when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll be sure to send you a copy when it's out.
